thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Erica L Garrison

author: Erica L Garrison
title: Erica L Garrison
text: A good experience and customer appreacheat ion our sales rep helped us pick out a nice bed and made sure we were able to find something in our price range even tho we had them run 100 different beds he stayed patient with us until finding the right bed
